scripts.build:cleave: rm -rf dist/ngx-cleave-directive && ng build ngx-cleave-directive --configuration production && cp -r projects/ngx-cleave-directive/src/lib dist/ngx-cleave-directive/src
scripts.build:lower-case: rm -rf dist/ngx-lower-case-directive && ng build ngx-lower-case-directive --configuration production && cp -r projects/ngx-lower-case-directive/src/lib dist/ngx-lower-case-directive/src
scripts.build:trim: rm -rf dist/ngx-trim-directive && ng build ngx-trim-directive --configuration production
scripts.build:upper-case: rm -rf dist/ngx-upper-case-directive && ng build ngx-upper-case-directive --configuration production && cp -r projects/ngx-upper-case-directive/src/lib dist/ngx-upper-case-directive/src
scripts.build:lodash-pipes: rm -rf dist/ngx-lodash-pipes && ng build ngx-lodash-pipes --configuration production && cp -r projects/ngx-lodash-pipes/src/lib dist/ngx-lodash-pipes/src
scripts.build:let: rm -rf dist/ngx-let-directive && ng build ngx-let-directive --configuration production && cp -r projects/ngx-let-directive/src/lib dist/ngx-let-directive/src
